title: MOTOROLA ZX Pro 127 cm (50 inch) Ultra HD (4K) LED Smart Android TV with Wireless Gamepad  (50SAUHDMQ)

product_specification.In The Box: 1 Television Set, Remote Control, Wallmount Stand, 2 AAA Batteries, 2 Desktop Stand, 4 Stand Support Screws, Quick Setup Guide, Gaming Controller, Power Cord, AV Converting Cable
product_specification.Sound Technology: Dolby Atmos, Dolby Audio, DTS Studio Sound
product_specification.Other Audio Features: AmphisoundX, Front Firing Speaker, Dolby Atmos, DTS Studio Sound
product_specification.Processor: MediaTek CA53 Quad Core at 1.5 GHz
product_specification.Graphic Processor: Mali G52 Quad Core Graphic Engine 850 MHz
product_specification.Supported App - Others: Prime Video, Google Suite of Apps and Others Downloadable From Playstore
product_specification.Other Internet Features: All Features Available with Official Android 10.0 TV - Fast Boot, Optimised Memory Management, Enhanced Speed
product_specification.Other Connectivity Features: Two Way Bluetooth 5.0, Built-In Chromecast, Optical, Antenna, Google Assistant
product_specification.Other Remote Control Features: Combi Remote (Bluetooth + Infrared) with Google Assistant, Multiple Hot Keys for Easy Access
product_specification.Covered in Warranty: Warranty is Non-transferrable, Valid Only in the Territory of India and Extended Only to the First End User Customer (Customer). Warranty will be Valid Only When the Original Purchase Invoice is Presented at the Time of Service. Warranty will Cover Only Functional Parts and Software Issues Having Manufacturing Defects and Does Not Cover Damages Resulting From Un-authorised Adaptations / Adjustments / Tampering of the Product, Improper Installation of the Product, Normal Wear and Tear Caused Due to Use of Product
product_specification.Not Covered in Warranty: Warranty Does Not Cover Damage Caused to the Product Due to Improper Installation by Customer, Normal Wear and Tear Caused Due to Use of Product. Warranty Does Not Cover Any External Accessories to the Product (Such as Battery, Cable, Carrying Bag Etc). All Plastic, Rubber, Glass, or Aesthetic Parts and Consumable Replacements will be on a Chargeable Basis. All Transportation and Handling Expenses Incurred While Replacing or Repairing Will be Payable by the Customer. Warranty Shall be Voids If: a) The Type or Serial No. On the Product has been Altered, Removed or Defaced.
product_specification.Installation & Demo Details: Please note that any unauthorized handling or self-installation of the product will lead to return & product warranty being void. We'll facilitate the installation and demo through authorized service engineer at your convenience. Flipkart will communicate the day and time slot of the scheduled Installation & Demo through a SMS and the same information will also be available in your order details page. The service engineer will install your new TV, either on wall mount or on table top. Installation and demo are provided free of cost. The engineer will also help you understand your new TV's features. The process generally covers: Wall-mounted or table-top installation, as requested. Physical check of all ports, including power and USB ports. Accessories also checked. Demonstration of features and settings. Quick run-through on how to operate the TV

product_description.AutoTuneX Display Technology: AutoTuneX Display Technology gives you the ultimate cinematic experience, every time. Depending on the source and type of content, the Motorola TV automatically tunes each frame of video content for an optimal combination of colours and contrast to enhance your viewing experience. The dynamic contrast ratios facilitate highly detailed representations of darker shades and highlights by bringing out the finer elements in each pixel of the frame.
product_description.Dolby Vision + HDR 10: Dolby Vision & HDR 10 give you unmatched image accuracy by decoding scene by scene brightness, contrast & colour performance instructions just like the content creator visualised. Dolby transforms the science of sight and sound into spectacular experiences. Brighter highlights and a wider range of colour detail give you a punchier image overall. The 10-bit colour depth enables incredible visual possibilities with an extensive range of up to 1.07 billion colours.

review:
I received on 31st Dec'2020. My reviews after 18 days usage are,
PROS:
1. 4K display with lg ips panel is awesome.
2. All connectivities like Bluetooth, USB, WiFi, Hdmi are working smooth.
3. Play store, Google Asst working good.
4. Games with Game pad experience for kids is fine. But not tried with more games.

CONS:
1. Stand by time while switch on is taking time to show home page.
2. Even this has Dts dolphy with 24 watt speaker, sound of this tv is really disappointed. Because I had panasonic with just 20 watt before this, delivered very good sound with base and volume in 12 points of volume. But in Moto zpro 43uhd, no base, no clear voice. So you should buy or should have additional sound bar or home theater with more than 50 or 60 watt speakers.

Final conclusion: If you will manage this with Additional sound bar for better experience, You can go for it without hesitation. Worth for money.

Only one WORD..... AWESOME...

Yes, Guys! Can there be a TV with visual sub of a LG/Samsung TVs with outstanding audio quality /clarity of a Sony TV? Yes... Here's it...

The name is Motorola ZX Pro. I took 55 TV as I felt it suits my hall. I bet it is. Now, my wife complains that I am not moving out of the sofa watching TV all the time. Yes. I am clean bowled by the Yorker of Flipkart.

No word to praise it, friends...
The awesome sound bar and the bluetooth stand alone audio receiver function is outstanding.
4K visuals and 4K/UHD visuals will make you fall in love with it over and over again.

The TV is fill of PROs and no CONs.
I realize that it's a full paisa vasool TV...
Thank you Flipkart for such a great product.

It's more of a family tv where elders can enjoy watching just the tv and young and kids can play. I liked the connectivity and gaming options. They are smooth.
Only con is upscaling of sd channels. It doesn't do any justice. Does decent job for hd channels. Picture quality is good and wide viewing angles. One other con is during dark scenes(streaming in Netflix) you see pixels appear as glitters. Not always though. overall good tv for the price, most of the time you will enjoy with it.

Excellent Tv at this price range

All features like 4k, dolby vision and atmos, bluetooth, wifi, gamepad, apps all works flawlessly.

I bought 50 inch tv which is VA panel.Im very satisfied that there is no edge bleeding on panel also I observed tv from all angles this VA panel gives same colour so no issues observed.

Build quality is solid better than mi tvs. Only thing is tv bracket is somewhat okay. Manufacturer must have studied it but I felt it could be bit more sturdy and strong

Installation was smooth. Need to drill two holes in wall and then single frame bracket and adjustable straps

Front firing speakers are good but I recommend to have dolby atmos soundbar to truly unlock tvs potential.

Tv remote is bit big with unnecessary keys. Plus point is few dedicated buttons like netflix, youtube, zee5 etc.

Hardware wise it exceeds others as it has quad core processor with 32 gb storage which helps to install more apps with less lag on ui

Picture engine:
Picture processing and upscaling is very good. Less lag and fluid motion. Transitions in scenes are good as you see continuous motion without any lags.
Dolby vision works well with hdr

Overall I feel its best value for money deal with all features. I got it for 30499 for tv and 4199rs for 3yr extended warranty.

Hopefully it will last long!!

Review based on Product only... As if I try to include review based on delivery and installation then the rating would be 1 star only that too for product.

Picture quality is awesome. I mean at this price point didn't expected this good picture quality. A true 4K panel used. Even though it has VA panel which is different than LG IPS panels from 43 and 55 inch ZXpro TV, it has a very wide viewing angle... From a very sharp angle you can experience a little whiteness in picture but from a very shar angle. I'm very impressed with the picture quality. Just the vivid, standard picture modes sucks... Very artificial. Best picture mode is Movie mode. Perfect for everything you watch.

Sound quality is not that great. It's loud. It has bass. But something is lacking but it's kinda adjustable. You can bare with it.

Software has a little laggyness here and there in just 3 days. I have to say not the good optimization used here. Can't comment more yet. Got 1 software update. No difference found.

Connectivity is good. Can watch IPL at highest resolution of Disney+hotstar on wifi. Just the gamepad controller is not connecting everytime ... It's like not satisfying one.

Looks good. Feels good. Remote is also good. It's truly BLE remote. You don't have to point it towards TV to turn it on/off or change anything.

Chromecast is not good man. Doesn't works always. Sometimes works... Sometimes don't.

Apart from this i haven't checked much... Just 3 days of usage and I'm pretty impressed by picture and color reproduction. Just the software slowness is what giving me double thoughts...

Will surely update the review after a month of usage.

Sound quality very good just like a theater, it is 4K Tele so you need high good quality signal for this television, make sure to have a proper settop box, definitely value for money, I like my purchase no worries, also wireless game pad, easy remote, if you feel like treating yourself then go for it, you will enjoy watching movies on this television. Thank you Flipkart you always make it very easy for us, very happy with your service aswell.

Awesome picture and sound clarity, Dolby Sound is very good and awesome. However, Dts content is in Dts format only. It won't support by this tv. So you have to convert it into Dolby audio through audio and video converter software in PC. Once you convert the dts content from dts audio to Dolby Audio then you can seamlessly enjoy the dts content in realistic true 5.1 surround sound on your soundbar,home theater or AV Receiver through Dolby Audio. Then not only dts, It also won't support aac 5.1 and Dolby true hd. If other 5.1 or 7.1 audios can't be supported by this TV don't worry you can convert it into Dolby audio format (ac3) in PC using audio video converter software.. And enjoy by listening true 5.1 suurond sound experience...

Thank You!

THIS review is after using 10days vigorously.
Tv is good, nice delivery, installed in 10min.


Every thing is excellent.
After 9 days use I found MOTOROLA ZX PRO is automatically/ Suddenly EXITING applications like YouTube/Hotstar.

I installed Asphalt 8 and it's working good.

And

On remote I don't know why they have given EXIT button.
On pressing EXIT button, should come out of application at once but it works same like BACK button
And
We are struggling to press OK button which is small, placed at centre of navigation buttons.

Very good smart TV.

Picture quality is ok according to price. Connectivity is good even in 2.4GHz. The android experience is not good at all. Recommending a cable or DTH for better experience. btw the delivery was fast & installation also fast and good.

Very nice tv. I personally loved it ,don't waste extra money on LG,sony,Samsung, Motorola zx pro is the best tv in the budget segment.please don't waste any time on YouTube reviews ,youtubers just only look their benefit.this tv can easily defeat top brands in picture quality.this is the best tv I have ever experienced.Go for it.... Without any tension.

Great product for the price you pay. Premium look and feel. Installation was done in 24hrs post delivery. Sound is average though it's got a dedicated sound bar. If you are using soundbar then it's good. Also hdmi arc will not work with airtel due to airtel firmware issue. Need to work with airtel technical team in an escalation mode. One cons is it doesn't have a headphone port
good picture & sound quality i like it and i got it for 36000RS on sale. i like the picture quality its superb

Picture quality is awesome and specially sound is just mind blowing. The best TV in this budget. If your budget is in this range then just go for it blindly. You can't find better than this, and you won't regret. In short superb..

Received 50 inch TV on next day. Installation done on next day.
Already visit different showroom and seen all TV product in same price range. This TV sound and picture quality is good if compare to other brand like Nokia 2020, TCL, Kodak, Samsung, Hisense TV (Except Tornado), Iffalcon, Sanyo, Sansui, Onida.

VA panel in 50 inch TV and 43 and 55 inch TV - LG IPS panel type.

Sound - 5 / 5
Picture - 4.5 / 5
Connectivity - 4 / 5
Look - 4 / 5
Build Quality - 4 / 5
Perfect. This is my first smart tv and I felt it’s best with the price, picture quality and sound quality. Really good buy at this price.
100% perfect sound picture and build quality with awesome remote faster smoothly performance 💕

Ive been using the TV for a few weeks now. The soundbar is a good addon but not the best ofcourse. Could be a little bit more clearer. The bass is definitely better than other TVs in the same range but not the best, again clarity is a bit weak. Im probably spoiled by the definition and clarity and bass of my Harmon Kardon speakers. Screen clarity is good, im satisfied and the 55inch size is awesome. I honestly wasnt expecting it to be this big. 55inch didnt seem soo big when i was window shopping in our local mall. 4K video are pretty ridiculous watching in 55inch. I also use this TV for gaming from my PC. I have an Nvidia 1660 and its struggling with resolving at 4k, i have to reduce graphics settings in the games, and running it at lower res kinda makes games choppy, defintely have to consider upgrading my graphic card in the future.

Nways good TV, worth the prize in this range and also i feel better not choosing a chinese TV.

Best tv guys ...consider this tv if under 31 k ...very good sound quality ...even at 20 volume its like a home theater ...4k video quality ...games are like super dooper ...and the gamepad also very nice ..playing asphalt 8 is like playing in real life ..thats the quality ...the perfect size it 43 inch dont go beyond it

Picture quality 4/5 (downside is that in bright rooms the screen reflects slightly, most suitable for dark rooms)

Brightness 4/5 (350 nits but still beats most of the budget category TVs)

Sound 3.5/5 (increase the volume and even neighbours will hear, lower the volume and even I can't hear, you will need to find the right balance, external bar works fine no issues there)

Connectivity 4/5 (Wireless headphones sounds bit low, don't know if that's an software issue)

Dolby vision 3.5/5 (speakers sounds bit low when playing dolby vision movies. Don't know why?!)

Gaming 4/5 (Remember TVs are for watching shows, casual games are fun but high end games will lag a bit)

Smartness 3.5/5

Remote 3.5/5 (would have been better if it had a clean look, most of the buttons are non-usable)

Most important aspect to look for a TV is it's picture quality, brightness, panel, color correction basically it's display features and this is one of the best you will get keeping in mind the price. Nokia is also a good choice, but it was missing some features I needed.

Don't fall for a TV by it's smart features, UI, OS, remote all that can be fixed by adding external devices like android tv box, sound bar, etc

Got the TV delivered in two days of placing the order, installation guy came the next day,

I must mention the installation guy from Jeeves was a bit unprofessional and was rushing things, also the wall mount was installed slightly crossed

One of the best purchasr I have made, this tv is as much as you want.
Good things-
1. Good picture quality, 4k videos seems like real. HD channels seem good.
2. Built quality is good, fine finiahing qnd all.
3. Connectivity is smooth.
4. Playing games with controller is up level fun.
5. We keep sound at just 20 and that too is more than enough

Things I didn't like.
1. Sound quality is good, it gives you theater like experience. But the vocal volume is low, so you have to turn the volume more up to hear the dialogs but other sound effect also increases.

Go for this tv if you want, ita worth it.

I am writing this review after 25 days of my purchase. Initially I hesitated but took risk because of better RAM n memory space this smart TV has in comparison to others in same price range. It turn out an Excellent buy for me. Sound, picture, connectivity all excellent in comparison with price. Good gaming experience is extra..... Thanks to Flipkart n of course Moto.....

I believe this is the best budget 4K TV available in this price range.
Build quality is good, comes with stands and wall mounting accessories, Wireless GamePad, Full featured remote, an input cable and finally with a sound bar of 50W. Believe me, that specification for a sound is way ahead for a TV and sounds like a mini Home Theatre.
Dolby Atmos and dts Studio do their work perfectly and Dolby Vision enhances the picture quality and colour vibrancy just like any person would want.
Performance is smooth, Booting is fast.
This is my one week review. May add anything in future (if required). If you are looking in reviews to know about this product, I should say you can go for this product.
Thanks 👍🏿

Overall review is somewhat good , but I still didn't understand the model name ..it should show ZX PRO Or Motorola , it is showing that Flipkart TV , Im missing this logic...I just saw the model name ..I didn't observe this as of now .. Any experts can explain why it is showing like that ?
Otherwise I will return this TV...

Looks- Average. The grey soundbar at bottom doesn't look great. Bezels are less.
Screen- Good. Brightness better than TCL and Thomson. Colours are brighter too. However screen bleeding issue is prominent.
Sound- Good. Very good for watching TV. However separate soundbar is required for rich movie experience.
Connectivity is fine. Remote works well. Dual band wifi is good (required if net speed is more than 30 Mbps).
Gamepad works fine. Can be used as remote also.

Overall good purchase. Will recommend it.

Nice Budget Smart TV... Go For It.
I Do Lot Of Research Before Buying it & Now I Am Satisfied 😊😊

The TV is awesome. The colour are vibrant especially in 4k. The TV as 55 inch looks huge with characters as in theatre. The in built speaker not so loud but is having good quality sound. It's good for small room like bedroom. No need of sound bar etc

Brought 43 inch version and felt great value for money product. Highly recommend if you are looking for 43 inch smart TV with premium TV features at budget price. Display is really good for room with high natural light coming in. 2 GB RAM provides smooth experience without any lags. I am playing asphalt 8 as well and didn't observed any lagging or display issues.

Just wow wow and gamepad also very cool not support for pubg. Everything is cool and fine. Audio features should tune by company. I have gone through more reviews before buying all are saying audio will be bit low but with YouTube and Netflix I didnt face the issue, and when turned on Dolby audio it's working better compared to normal mode, No much difference but it's a very good. When Dolby audio movies you watch.

Pros.
1.soundbar not needed, good soundbar inbuild
2. Dolby atmos is amazing even in buetooth mode(im using sony woofer speaker set with ampli) best cenematic sound experience.
3.Picture quality better than good but not upto mark for brand like moto.but for price is good.
4.hd and and 4k video best to view, sd chanels dont expect magic but upscaling seems acceptably good
5. Graphic memory and storage big yes better than any brand in market. Gaming is amazing and hamepad is very good quality.
6 duel band wifi and blue tooth connectivity are good
Cons.
1. Pic quality is substandard, contrast ratio is poor, blacks are gray.
2. Backlight bleeding is prominently seen
3. Response time is good but fast moving scene is bit hassle for action movie lovers.
4. LG ips panel but dosent feel like one.
5. Dark room it shows balck as gray and light yellowish screen.
Overall
Picture 3.5/5
Sound 4.5/5
Connectivity 5/5
Gaming 5/5
Value for money5/5
Some sugestions.
1. Keep video on user mode by changing backlight brightness and saturation settings preset settings do not seem well
2. Use dule band wifi and soudbar or woofers for better experience
A good buy deal for mutupurpose and economicaly worth deal hust have to adjust with picture quality a little bit but according to price seems woth

Detailed review after 3 weeks of usages
Sound: very gd sound, except high bass which is given by sound bar or woofer. We should not expect home theater sound from a tv. No tv can give that quality. But i still like it's sound. To watch tv serials, news sound is great. I switch to sound bar only when need high bass.

Picture Quality :
People has been commenting and talking, its old display
And Won't match hisense or vu picture quality. But believe me. Its better than that. Full viewing angle. Nature picture whixh is great than unrealistic pictures. Picture qualitiy review you can see at lg Ultra HD (UHD) tv. As there are less review and pictures on moto tv.

Price :
Cheaper than other tv available with same or lesser specs.
More than worth the money.
Update: Sound: i have stopped using external sound bar just to save some power. Now i like sound from tv better than soundbar. More clear n crisp. More than enough bass.
Go for it.

Pros
1) value for money
2) 4K apps and HDR content in bright light is very good
3) better than tcl and mi tv for the picture quality

Cons
1) picture is so bright.
2) upscaling issue if you use SD channel and HDMi cable
3) no proper bass support for sound
4) no headphone support
A very good product and economical however sound is average, but it would be noticed only if you are used to enjoy music on Yamaha or Bose like speakers

Pros: Picture quality is excellent. So is the audio. Automatic brightness feature let's the user have optimal viewing experience without manual input. Connectivity options are very good interms of bluetooth, wireless etc.

The gamepad comes with the package is awesome. Its built quality is also good and navigation is very easy. Smart applications makes the experience larger.

Cons: All the connectivity options are on the back side. If it is mounted on the wall, then it becomes very hard to reach out for USB, HDMI etc.

Backlight bleeding is a piece of concern, which is going to impact the pixel resolution in the long run. It is strongly advised to reduce the backlight manually in order to have a longer life of the TV.

Conclusion: Smart TV with so many features and with latest technology is coming with such an affordable price range. Motorala made it possible. VALUE FOR MONEY, indeed. Thanks.

First thing I love to watch webseries/ movies on big screen. Have been already using Sony led worth 1.6 lacs, took a chance to purchase this model for my bedroom. Surprisingly it surpassed my expectations. It is one of the best model in current market at this price range. Only the tv remote sometimes runs erratic. One small suggestion to u guys, buy this tv for amazing picture clarity that too at amazing price range and buy some good sound bar (preferably Sony) with Hdmi, Dolby atmos support, I bet u’ll have one of the best tv experience
Thanks Flipkart for bringing this wonderful model

Looks great and works great so far. I was skeptical about buying a Motorola brand (for TV) but the reviews helped and also went in for a 3 Yr full protection plan to insure against any issues with service later.

The bezels are thin and the picture quality is quite good.
I was upgrading from MI 4A 32 inch to this one and the size would always be overwhelming at once to compare. There is a lot of talk about IPS vs VA panel and the bleeding but I'd save it for the pundits out there, I found it great and see no problems so far.
The speaker sounds normal, can't alternate that to a 2.1 or 5.1 quality audio.

The game controller is fun, I have growing kids so they are very happy with this addl toy and more importantly saves me from the addl game station for now. haha

I din't have Netflix and Zee5 subscribed yet so instead of wasting those two hot keys on the remote, I configured it as Prime Video and Disney Hotstar keys instead, was fun and felt achieving to configure :)

But since i bought this TV for my bedroom to see content occasionally instead of laptop had decided to keep it else would have returned it.
I think those who haven't experienced high quality panel content will not complain about this TV, and that is the only reason why I reduced 2 stars.
Apart from that this TV is excellent in all other aspects.

Here are some of the main pro and cons

Pros:
1. Remote: It connects via Bluetooth and IR, hence you can use it any direction, but power on/off has to be done using IR only which can be inconvenient, also it has mic for voice search but doesn't have search button, it could have been great addition instead of the Google assistant button.
2. Powerful CPU, good RAM and large storage memory for installing apps. This is good because my Sony TV takes much longer time to boot Android 9 and also has smaller storage space for apps limiting the number of appa that I can use.
3. Joystick:I don't think any other TV comes with joystick, and this joystick is of very good quality and I like playing games using it, but since Android TV app Store has limited games, we can't try all the great Android games on TV.
4. Comes with a good wall mount, I think other low cost TVs generally comes without wall mount stand.

Cons:
1. Panel: This is truly the only thing I hated about this TV, it lacks the colour punch that I receive on my old Sony TV.

The best vlue for money 4K LED TV with IPS display by LG! Huge 32 GB internal memory so you need not worry about running out of space. The CPU and GPU are lacking a bit, but I would advise you not to play danding games on it as the experience is not that good. Instead you can connect a console and play upto 4K with 60 Hz (not 120 Hz but that's fine, if you ask me). Also thanks to it's in built Bluetooth, you can connect any wireless earphone or headphone or even speaker and hear audio which is an excellent option when watching at night! Also with the Bluetooth connected earphones you can hear all game consoles as well though there is a small lag, but it beats having to purchase expensive proprietary official headsets of the console makers.

I would've loved the option to connect and disconnect Bluetooth accessories, but unfortunately the only option given is unpair.

That said, I did not like the remote. I liked the FireTV remote more as it was very easy to navigate on that remote, but this one is just OK.

Another problem I faced with the remote was that sometimes Google Assistant does not work and there are only 2 ways to get it working again: restart the TV or unpair and pair the Bluetooth remote.

The WiFi is also extremely good with support for both 2.4 Ghz and 5 Ghz, but as my router is away from TV I have to use 2.4 Ghz and the speed I get is above 24 Mbps on my 70 Mbps plan with the router in first bedroom.

The TV has received 3 updates so far and the UI has changed a bit with top tab navigation, but unfortunately no Android 11 yet.

I am satisfied with Android 10 and I don't feel that I am missing out on anything by not having Android 11 yet.

The TV takes a bit of time to start but it's not much, maybe 2 minutes or so after switching it on from wall.

I have connected it to a Philips 2.1 soundbar via HDMI1 which has ARC (not eARC) and the soundbar displays PCM unfortunately and not Dolby, although the built in speakers support Dolby Atmos but even my non Dolby Atmos Philips soundbar performs better.

All in all it's a great value for money option and I recommend it over other TVs becuase of it's LG IPS display.

TLDR; basic users can't find a better tv than this on the market, go ahead buy it you won't regret it, pro users: stay away, abysmal colour calibration for HDR/Dolby Vision

There are two use cases for a smart tv: one is a basic user who's upgraded to a smart tv from a dumb tv and just wants to stream something from Netflix/Amazon prime. Many of these users will be using a smart tv for the first time in their life so they will hardly be bothered with pro aspects of a tv screen. For most of these users who constitute 99% of the user base out there in India, this is the best tv on the market you can buy. Hook in, plug in, start streaming and that's the end of it. You cannot buy a better tv than this as an entry level smart tv and at this price. It's simply unbeatable.

For pro users who actually care about things like HDR/Dolby Vision, stay as far away as you can from this tv. The colour calibration for HDR/Dolby Vision is abysmal, i wouldn't use this tv for viewing HDR/Dolby Vision content even if forced at a gunpoint. My PS5 has abysmal picture quality on HDR on this screen. But then again, the price point for this tv is so low, this is to be expected.

I am giving feedback after using Motorola zx pro(55") TV for one month.
Pros-:1)Picture quality-With support of Dolby vision & HDR10
It works superb.4K Resolution is good.
Sound -:50W Dolby Atmos sound gives cinematic experience & bass is good enough.Crystal clear sound so that it feels smooth even if sound is in high volume.
Connectivity-:Very good,Fast & automatically added when once paired.Dual band wifi connectivity available.Gaming with android 10 is smooth with mali GPU processor.All ott apps are working fine.

Cons-:1)Viewing angle should be increased
2)Processor lag slightly just after starting of TV.
3)4 years no damage warranty costs 4000 bucks.It should be less.
4K Videos played on given inbuilt program not in installed program by us. Not work all software to play the 4K videos.

TV doesn't turn on sometimes when you keep it on for a longer period. You have to kill the switch and wait for 1-2 minutes then it gets on.

The YouTube gets crash while playing full HD videos. No it's not an internet issue. When you select the audio quality to 4K it's get crashed.

Sometimes the audio will play and the screen will be blackout on YouTube.

All these things gets fixed by restarting and rebooting but who the fish wants to reboot it every week.

The movie scenes in the night are not that good. You will see white patches sometimes.
All good except sound, that is low compared to others.

Really in love with this tv. Still couldn't belive how colorful and sharpness the picture quality is. Didn't had any issue with the setup or connectivity, it was sweet as simple. Display quality was top notch, can be viewed from sideways too (not extremely side). IPS Panel makes the colors even more rich and premium (although there's some backlight bleeding at the top as it was bezel less panel, can be seen in dark scenes. But still it doesn't spoil the mood or disturbs. Also backlight bleeding is very common in IPS Panel and certain level is acceptable by any brands). 4K HDR10 60FPS, Dolby Vision everything works perfectly. Dolby Atmos is there but I belive it's not like what it's meant for, it's more like a fine tuned equalizer.

Only thing where i got irritated was with connecting this tv with my hdmi arc supported samsung home theater. Initially i couldn't connect arc. Tech people who came for service had no idea what hdmi arc was, suggested me to connect with bluetooth. Since ARC was not working, I raised return request and it was approved too. But luckily i made some tweaks in settings, now hdmi arc works. Hence canceled my return request.
